message.content: [{"category":"JOB","isJob":true,"play":"Reply today—they asked for availability. Suggest 2-3 specific times.","draft":"Thanks for reaching out! I'm very interested in the role. I'm available Tuesday 2-4pm or Wednesday morning. Would either work?"},{"category":"JOB","isJob":true,"play":"Follow up—11 days since you wrote. Reference something specific about the role.","draft":"Hi! Wanted to check in on my application. I'm particularly excited about the design systems work. Any updates?"},{"category":"NETWORKING","isJob":false,"play":"Confirm the meeting—they proposed a time.","draft":"Tuesday at 2pm works perfectly! Looking forward to it. Should I come to your office or meet virtually?"},{"category":"JOB","isJob":true,"play":"Wait—sent 3 days ago. Follow up after day 5 if no response.","draft":""},{"category":"JOB","isJob":true,"play":"Reply ASAP—they want to schedule a final round. Share 3-4 time slots.","draft":"That's great to hear! I'm available Monday 10am-2pm, Tuesday after 3pm, or Thursday all day. Let me know what works best!"}]
